item.title: SuscribeUserUnplainedIncident.rb
item.description: require 'softlayer_api' require 'pp' username = '' key = 'apikey_goes_here' #The customer ID you whish add the suscription customerID = 205830 client = SoftLayer::Client.new( :username => username,:api_key => key) userClient = client.service_named('SoftLayer_User_Customer') result = userClient.object_with_id(customerID).addNotificationSubscriber("UNPLANNED_INCIDENT") # if the notification suscriber has been added we procede to create the suscriberDeliveryMethods if result deliveryMethodKeyNames = [ "EMAIL" ] result = userClient.object_with_id(customerID).createSubscriberDeliveryMethods("UNPLANNED_INCIDENT", deliveryMethodKeyNames) pp (result) end
